function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on building safe pedestrian routes in a COVID-19 pandemic context may overlook other contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential failure to address the spread of other contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Expand the model to incorporate parameters relevant to a wider range of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for different contagious diseases parameters.","People":"Public, urban planners, researchers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Anonymous surveys used for evaluation may inadvertently collect sensitive personal data.","Impact":"Privacy breaches and potential exposure of sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data anonymization protocols and conduct thorough privacy impact assessments.","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, secure survey platforms.","People":"Survey participants, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, ethics review boards, survey platform providers."},{"Description":"Commonsense information about environmental conditions may not account for disease transmission factors.","Impact":"Ineffective identification of optimal pedestrian routes for disease avoidance.","Mitigation":"Incorporate disease transmission factors into the model, such as airflow, humidity, and surface contact.","Technologies":"Environmental sensors, disease transmission models.","People":"Public, urban planners, researchers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, environmental monitoring agencies."}]}
